name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the subscription, which marks the server state for managing the subscription.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the subscription, which marks the server state for managing the subscription.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details for a human to contact about the subscription. The primary use of this for system administrator troubleshooting.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details for a human to contact about the subscription. The primary use of this for system administrator troubleshooting.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details for a human to contact about the subscription. The primary use of this for system administrator troubleshooting.

name: $end
desc: Returns: The time for the server to turn the subscription off.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The time for the server to turn the subscription off.

name: $reason
desc: Returns: A description of why this subscription is defined.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of why this subscription is defined.

name: $criteria
desc: Returns: The rules that the server should use to determine when to generate notifications for this subscription.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The rules that the server should use to determine when to generate notifications for this subscription.

name: $error
desc: Returns: A record of the last error that occurred when the server processed a notification.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A record of the last error that occurred when the server processed a notification.

name: $channel
desc: Returns: Details where to send notifications when resources are received that meet the criteria.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Details where to send notifications when resources are received that meet the criteria.
